name: Flora
desc: Flora is the owner of the flower shop Floral Whisper. She is the younger sister of Chloris, a botanist who can be found in Windrise.

customize.name: Sweet Flower
customize.desc: Particularly fragrant flowers. They can be found easily, even in the dark. Just follow the scent.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Windwheel Aster
customize.desc: A plant that adores the wind. To the proud children of the wind, or the citizens of Mondstadt, the Windwheel Asters are "the visible winds."

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Cecilia
customize.desc: A beautiful flower with a name that suits its appearance. It only grows where harsh winds blow, and is just as intangible as the true heart of an unbound soul.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Small Lamp Grass
customize.desc: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Calla Lily
customize.desc: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked, the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Personality</color>
Flora loves flowers. She has a Bloatty Floatty imaginary friend who she calls "Mr. Floaty."
<color=#ffffff>Appearance</color>
Flora has short blonde hair and blue-green eyes. She wears a pink and white dress with a white headband, long white socks and brown Mary Jane shoes.

Flora: Welcome to Floral Whisper. Do you need anything?
I. Traveler: About Stormterror...
Flora: It's great that I don't have to worry about the flowers in my store being blown away by the wind.
Flora: That said, the Dandelion Seeds have also been blown all across the region of Mondstadt by this storm. Who knows, perhaps they will bloom throughout the land.
Flora: When I think about it like that, the storm doesn't seem so scary anymore, haha.
II. Traveler: Tell me about your flowers.
Flora: We carry a large variety of flowers. Are you looking for anything in particular?
I. Traveler: Tell me about Dandelions.
Flora: Dandelions are so feathery. They are my personal favorite.
Flora: The Acting Grand Master of the Knights is also known as the Dandelion Knight, as I recall.
Flora: She probably learned the power of Anemo from the dandelions, hehe.
I. Traveler: Why do you like Dandelions so much?
Flora: Hehe, I wonder... Maybe it's because I've been reading The Fox in the Dandelion Sea.
Flora: Here, take it. Maybe you'll like dandelions too once you finish reading it, hehe.
II. Traveler: Tell me about Sweet Flowers.
Flora: Sweet Flowers, you say?
Flora: They look nice, but most people just use them for cooking.
Flora: If you see people having Sweet Flowers in their gardens...
Flora: They are probably used to get sugar.
III. Traveler: Tell me about Cecilias.
Flora: Cecilias! You've got good taste.
Flora: They grow in cold and windy places. Legend has it they only bloom when it's quiet.
Flora: If you wish to cultivate them...
Flora: You'll probably have better luck with Mist Flowers.
III. Traveler: Sorry for bothering you.
Flora: You need to go?
Flora: I'll tell you more about flowers next time if you like.

<color=#ffffff>Voice Over I</color>
Dandelions?
<color=#ffffff>Voice Over II</color>
Well, if it's an injury...

value.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (I)
value.desc:
"Dandelion, Dandelion, ride the wind to a faraway land," the Fox chants.
An unforgettable Mondstadt fairytale about a hunter and a fox. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, an 11-part story, begins here.

desc.text:
Message
"Darn! I lost the bet again, so they forced me to propose to Flora!"
"But those idiots didn't say how I was supposed to propose, so here I am! No one would know who I am, I'm such a genius! Take that, you idiots!"
"Anyway... Flora, I like you. There you go."
Cat's Tail's reply
Finally, a proposal of love on the message board! We're touched, and wish you the best, no matter who you are.
By the way, we have the perfect thing for you at Cat's Tail if you ever decide you need the courage to propose face-to-face. With love.
